    • Field Detail

      • SPECIALCHARS

        private static final java.lang.String SPECIALCHARS
        The available specialchars for the keyword.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_PATTERN

        private static final java.lang.String KEY_PATTERN
        Regex pattern for validating keyword strength. Keyword must include at least: - one small letter - one big letter - one digit - one Specialchrar defined in SPECIALCHARS - between 10 and 20 chars long.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • alphabet

        private static final java.lang.String alphabet
        Alphabet for shifting. Can be extended.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MANUAL_KEY

        private static final java.lang.String MANUAL_KEY
        The manual key text, shown to the user when he executes the program with a unaccurate key.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Key for the encrytion/decryption.

        Returns:

      • validateKey

        private boolean validateKey(java.lang.String key)
        Validateds if the given Keyword is accurate and only contains literals available in the alphabet.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to test.
        Returns:
        boolean if key is strong enougth or not.

      • extendKey

        private java.lang.String extendKey(java.lang.String key,
                         int length)
        Expands/Mutates a key to a new length. Uses also the VigenereCipher algorithm with the alphabeth as key to generate new key elements. The new keyelements are concatinated until the key reaches a defined length..
        Parameters:
        key - Key to expand to the param length.
        length - Length of the new key.
        Returns:
        A key with the length of the param length..

      • cipher

        private java.lang.String cipher(java.lang.String plaintext,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      boolean encrypt)
        Encrypts/Decrypts a text with the VigenereCipher Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - Text to encrypt/decrypt.
        key - Key for the algorithm.
        encrypt - Boolean to select encrypt/decrypt
        Returns:
        with VigenereCipher encrypted/decrypted text.
